thread.title: Springboard ‘Awards for Excellence’ one week left until entries close
thread.title_full: Springboard ‘Awards for Excellence’ one week left until entries close

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Springboard ‘Awards for Excellence’ one week left until entries close
text:
Springboard ‘Awards for Excellence’ one week left until entries close Springboard ‘Awards for Excellence’ one week left until entries close Details Category: Awards   15:15 Deadline for the Springboard ‘Awards for Excellence’ 2015, which will celebrate and reward inspiring people, organisations and initiatives, is fast approaching. Final call for entries has been made and Monday 14th September - 9am will see the last day for businesses and individuals to submit their applications. Last year’s winners included: Accor UK & Ireland Hotels, PPHE Hotel Group, Oakman Inns & Restaurants Ltd and Alastair Storey, who received the coveted Chris Beaumont Award. 
Commenting, Springboard CEO, Anne Pierce MBE said: “The Springboard Awards for Excellence will recognise the very best in the industry. The process of entering the awards will help businesses identify their achievements as organisations and the outstanding work carried out by the individuals within it. Winning an award has a significant and positive impact on both business and your employees.” Closing date for entries is Monday 14th September 2015 – 9am with the Award winners announced at a spectacular celebration evening on Monday 2 November 2015, Novotel London West. To enter, visit: http://www.springboard.uk.net/events/springboard-awards-for-excellence
